recipesJson.name: 1-2-3 Strawberry Cheesecake Fluff
recipesJson.author: Kittybit
recipesJson.description:
Quick and easy 1-2-3 Strawberry Cheesecake.

Thanks to the LB Strawberry Cheesecake, this can pretty much work as SnV. I suggest give some steep over night, and you're good to go.
It's heavy on the strawberry, with exhale notes on the NY Cheesecake.
Good to go if you're in a hurry!

reviews.text: This is a really nice, light strawberry cheesecake.  I think the "fluff" is the perfect word to describe it, because it's definitely lighter than some of the other more popular SBCC recipes out there.  Definitely needs a couple of days steep if you ask me, but once it gets there, it's there.  Great recipe.
This is a nice creamy strawberry cheesecake.  The Cap NYCC helps to add some creamy body to the LB and that sweet syrupy JF Strawberry is wonderful.  Excellent mix.
